QuestData.Title: Rally the Frostwolves
QuestData.Description: My brother, in his haste, has already taken some of my clan with him and has begun an assault on Bladespire Citadel before we were ready.$b$bDraka awaits by our war horn. Please let her know that it is time to rally the clan!$b$bWith the aid of you and your forces, we might actually stand a chance at victory against the ogres.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Draka to sound the war horn.
QuestData.RewardText: The clan is prepared. It is time for us to advance on Bladespire Citadel!

Objectives.Objective: Ask Draka to sound the war horn
